trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There was one other sighting in Phoenix on or around January 22nd 2013
Summary: Witnessed 3 white or amber lights appear slowly from nothing then all 3 flew away at high speed, one at a time. Then a red one appeared from the exact same spot moved west for 2-3 secs. Then back east then gone.
divs: sighting detailssitting in washington park in phoenix, az. at about 2135 hrs i saw a series of white\amber lights appear in the south eastern sky. my view was i obstructed and the sky was clear. i continued to watch that location and for a period of approx 20 mins. and during that time i witnessed a total of 4 events. the first 3 were identical. bright light appears in thin air moves slowly west for 1-2 secs.then moves west slightly angled up. the speed at which they moved away was incredible. after the 3rd light moved away, a period of approx 3-5 mins passed and then the 3rd and final light appeared in the same spot. it was bright red, much brighter than the first 3. it then moved west 1-2 secs did a very tight u-turn and went back into the space it appeared from, and disappeared. i waited another 15 mins but saw no further activity.
